r.s: Class that provides multiple interfaces for sending emails
r.d: PEAR's Mail:: package defines the interface for implementing mailers under the PEAR hierarchy, and provides supporting functions useful in multiple mailer backends. Currently supported are native PHP mail() function, sendmail and SMTP. This package also provides a RFC 822 Email address list validation utility class.
r.n: The 'localhost' value can now be set in the SMTP driver.
